# What is the TIFF Viewer?
The TIFF Viewer provides a simple way to display TIFF images directly in your browser.
After selecting a dataset, the TIFF image will be shown. No special configuration or adjustments are needed â€” it's a lightweight, easy-to-use viewer.
## Key Features
- **Display**: View TIFF images quickly without external software. - **Basic Interaction**: Pan and zoom to explore details.
This tool is ideal for reviewing microscopy images, scanned documents, or any standard TIFF data.
